STAKING.NOTENABLEDINFO: Txaus tsis yog tam sim no enabled.

MASTERNODES.NOMNOUTPUTS: Tsis muaj Masternode tso zis pom. Txhawm rau khiav hauv zos Masternode xa raws nraim 2,5,25,50 lossis 100 lab npib rau koj qhov chaw nyob Masternode thiab tos rau 15 qhov kev lees paub.

MASTERNODES.REMOTENOTRUNNING: Tej thaj chaw deb Masternode tsis pom

SIGNMESSAGE.SIGN_DESCRIPTION: Koj tuaj yeem sau npe nrog koj qhov chaw nyob los ua pov thawj tias koj muaj lawv. Ceev faj tsis txhob xee npe rau tej yam tsis muaj tseeb, raws li phom sij tuaj yeem sim ntxias koj kos npe rau koj tus kheej rau lawv. Tsuas kos npe tag nrho cov nqe lus uas koj pom zoo rau.
SIGNMESSAGE.VERIFY_DESCRIPTION: Sau qhov chaw nyob kos npe, lus (xyuas kom koj luam daim kab so, cov kis, tabs, thiab lwm yam ntxiv) thiab kos npe hauv qab no kom paub tseeb tias cov lus qhia. Ceev faj tsis txhob nyeem ntau dua rau qhov kos npe dua li cov lus dab tsi hauv tsab ntawv kos npe rau nws tus kheej, kom tsis txhob muaj kev cuam tshuam los ntawm ib tug txiv neej-hauv-tus-nruab nrab nres.
SIGNMESSAGE.VERIFYFAIL: Cov lus tshawb fawb tau ua tsis tau

ABOUT.NUMBERBLOCKS: Cov naj npawb tam sim no

DEBUG.CONSOLEINFO: Txais tos rau Metrix Core RPC console. Ntaus kev pabcuam rau cov ntsiab lus muaj nyob rau hauv.
DEBUG.CONSOLEWARNING: CEEB TOOM: Scammers tau ua haujlwm, qhia cov neeg siv hom ntaus nqi ntawm no, nyiag lawv lub hnab ntawv. Tsis txhob siv cov console no tsis nkag siab txog qhov ramification ntawm ib lo lus txib.

REPAIR.INFOEXTERNAL: Cov kev kho lus txib no tsis tuaj yeem khiav thaum Metrix Core khiav tawm sab nraud
REPAIR.INFO: Cov nyees khawm hauv qab no yuav pib dua Metrix Core nrog cov kab-kev xaiv kom kho lub hnab, txhim kho teeb meem nrog cov ntaub ntawv tsis sib xws blockchain los yog cov khoom tsis pom / tsis raug mob.
REPAIR.SALVAGEINFO: -Txhoob Daim Ntawv Teeb Meem: Tiv thaiv kom rov qab tau cov yuam sij los ntawm lub hnab nyiaj tsis ncaj.
REPAIR.RESCANINFO: -rescan: Rescan lub blockchain rau cov hnab nyiaj muas tsis tau.
REPAIR.RECOVER1INFO: -zapwallettxes = 1: Rov qab muas ntawm blockchain (khaws meta-cov ntaub ntawv, xws li tus tswv tsev tus account)
REPAIR.RECOVER2INFO: -zapwallettxes = 2: Rov qab muas los ntawm blockchain (dauv meta-cov ntaub ntawv)
REPAIR.UPGRADEWALLETINFO: -gradewallet: Upgrade hnab nyiaj kom dhau hom pib ntawm startup. (Ceeb toom: qhov no TSIS tau hloov tshiab ntawm lub hnab nyiaj xwb!)
REPAIR.REBUILDINDEXINFO: -reindex: Rebuild blockchain Performance index ntawm blk000 tam sim no. dat ntaub ntawv.
REPAIR.BOOTSTRAPINFO: Daus Metrix blockchain cov ntaub ntawv los ntawm metrixcoin.com thiab bootstrap koj lub installation. Nyob ntawm koj lub network sib txuas qhov no tuaj yeem siv sijhawm li 10 feeb txog ob peb teev
REPAIR.SYNCFROMSTARTINFO: Tshem tawm koj cov ntaub ntawv hauv blockchain hauv zos thiab resync los ntawm thaiv genesis.
REPAIR.RESTARTCOREINFO: Rov pib Metrix Core yog tias nws twb khiav lawm lossis pib Metrix Core yog tias nws tsis tau khiav.
REPAIR.REINSTALLCOREINFO: Tshem tawm koj tus tub ntxhais hauv zos Metrix thiab rov nruab nws los ntawm Metrix servers.

PROMPT.ENCRYPTEDCONTENT: Cov backups yav dhau los koj tau ua los ntawm koj lub hnab nyiaj yuav tsum tau hloov nrog lub tshiab generated, encrypted hnab ntawv. Rau kev ruaj ntseg, yav dhau los backups ntawm lub hnab ntaub ntawv unencrypted yuav ua tsis tau li sai tau thaum koj pib siv cov tshiab, encrypted hnab nyiaj.
PROMPT.CLIENTCLOSEDUNEXPECTEDINFO: Muaj ib qho teeb meem nrog Metrix Core uas tau ua rau nws xaus. Nws yog pom zoo kom xyuas koj cov ntaub ntawv debug.log rau cov teeb meem.
